sentences.english: Looking at this pathetic scene, her heart broke. Weeping, she urged Tzu-chuan to wash Tai-yu quickly.

sentences.english: By Western standards she and her neighbors remain achingly poor.

sentences.english: You can not bear to recall the past, I am afraid that the past caused heart- rending , tear.
